type.description:
### тЪая╕П Requires [Apugli](https://apugli.readthedocs.io/en/latest/) to be installed! тЪая╕П

## Can Take Damage

---


[Entity Condition Type](https://apugli.readthedocs.io/en/latest/types/entity_condition_types/can_take_damage).

Checks if the entity is immune to a damage source.

Type ID: `apugli:can_take_damage`

---

source.description:
#### ЁЯЪи Depreciated ЁЯЪи

Use `damage_type` instead. [More information here.](https://apugli.readthedocs.io/en/latest/types/entity_condition_types/can_take_damage)

#### ЁЯЪи Depreciated ЁЯЪи

Use `damage_type` instead. [More information here.](https://apugli.readthedocs.io/en/latest/types/entity_condition_types/can_take_damage)
